Do you want delete all Overlays or just specific ones?
Create a folder on your internal memory and move overlays into it? After that you will be able to install them using the Layers Manager app.
Select parts of SystemUI to install.
Option to install all Overlays at once.
Always show the dialog where you have to confirm that you want to install Overlays.
